title: How do I change my controls
body:
I want to use my emotes and the boards says press T but thats my shop button. My friends say that it is p that is shop but when I downloaded lol i started as  
T as my shop. How do I change that? I've got a mac if that helps.
Plz Help

replies.body: Go in to settings, either ig or in client, I think it's in the visuals -> communications tab.
